DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of bimatoprost in patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Bimatoprost in Patients With Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of glaucoma or ocular hypertension in both eyes Patient requires IOPlowering drug in both eyes Uncontrolled medical conditions Ocular seasonal allergies within the past 2 years
